医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明益生元菊粉可以缓解烧伤患者的肌肉损失研究发现补充菊粉可以减轻严重烧伤大鼠的肠道微生物群失调和骨骼肌萎缩，这表明这是一种改善烧伤恢复结果的有希望的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Prebiotic-inulin-may-ease-muscle-loss-in-burn-victims-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Prebiotic-inulin-may-ease-muscle-loss-in-burn-victims-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d2f450e-90f2-4826-9ee9-0c48bd12eab4 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 19:25:00 -0500 Prebiotic inulin may ease muscle loss in burn victims, study suggests
研究揭开了神经胶质瘤浸润边缘的秘密高级别神经胶质瘤是在大脑或脊髓中快速扩散的癌性肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Study-unmasks-secrets-of-gliomas-pressive-margins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Study-unmasks-secrets-of-gliomas-pressive-margins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23f15a89-568b-4e05-9f5f-88ef674def10 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 19:05:33 -0500 Study unmasks secrets of glioma's invasive margins
研究发现温泉浴可促进肠道健康研究人员发现，在日本温泉中沐浴会显着改变健康个体的肠道微生物群，通过增加某些有益细菌来提供潜在的健康益处。这是第一项探讨不同温泉类型对肠道微生物群的不同影响的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Hot-spring-baths-shown-to-boost-gut-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Hot-spring-baths-shown-to-boost-gut-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6f74c36-f1b0-451b-b9d4-0276358c550d Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:58:00 -0500 Hot spring baths shown to boost gut health, study finds
威尔康奈尔医学研究员获得 210 万美元资助，用于研究重复 DNA 和 RNA 序列Jeannine Gerhardt 博士是威尔康奈尔医学院妇产科和生殖医学干细胞生物学助理教授，她获得了美国国家普通医学科学研究所 (NIGMS) 的一项为期五年、价值 210 万美元的资助，该研究所是该研究所的一部分。美国国立卫生研究院，研究重复 DNA 和 RNA 序列及其导致细胞功能障碍和疾病的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-researcher-wins-2421-million-grant-to-study-repetitive-DNA-and-RNA-sequences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Weill-Cornell-Medicine-researcher-wins-2421-million-grant-to-study-repetitive-DNA-and-RNA-sequences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84bb8015-f86b-4ac9-a53c-31a3a41bbf4a Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:31:30 -0500 Weill Cornell Medicine researcher wins $2.1 million grant to study repetitive DNA and RNA sequences
科学家使用非人类灵长类动物模型再生功能齐全的膀胱组织芝加哥安与罗伯特 H.卢里儿童医院和西北大学斯坦利·曼尼儿童研究所的科学家们在一项利用非人类灵长类动物模型的长期研究中成功再生了功能齐全的膀胱组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Scientists-regenerate-complete-function-urinary-bladder-tissue-using-a-non- human-primate-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Scientists-regenerate-complete-function-urinary-bladder-tissue-using-a-non- human-primate-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea5c7194-3e0c-4987-b9f3-84490e619996 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:26:01 -0500 Scientists regenerate fully functional urinary bladder tissue using a non-human primate model
胃绕道术和袖带结扎治疗短期并发症两种最常见的肥胖手术——胃绕道术和胃套术——短期并发症很少，从这个意义上来说是等效的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Gastric-bypass-and-sleeve-tie-in-short-term-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Gastric-bypass-and-sleeve-tie-in-short-term-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4df66021-3683-4982-83e5-7907f56b61f7 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:21:37 -0500 Gastric bypass and sleeve tie in short-term complications
研究发现，精神病谱系症状通常出现在接受心理健康服务的青少年身上劳伦斯·布隆伯格护理学院副教授克里斯汀·克莱维利 (Kristin Cleverley) 共同领导的一项新研究发现，证据表明精神病谱系症状 (PSS) 经常出现在接受心理健康服务的青少年中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Psychosis-Spectrum-Symptoms-often-present-in-youth-accessing-mental-health-services-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Psychosis-Spectrum-Symptoms-often-present-in-youth-accessing-mental-health-services-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bb40e4d-8d39-4a5b-88db-88dbea847c8b Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:16:49 -0500 Psychosis Spectrum Symptoms often present in youth accessing mental health services, study finds
纯素和酮饮食在短短两周内引发了独特的免疫系统变化美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员在一项针对转向纯素食或生酮（也称为酮）饮食的人的小型研究中观察到了快速而明显的免疫系统变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Vegan-and-keto-diets-trigger-distinct-immune-system-changes-in-just-two-weeks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Vegan-and-keto-diets-trigger-distinct-immune-system-changes-in-just-two-weeks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b58767cf-8f3c-4f45-b030-14018c54dc1d Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:12:31 -0500 Vegan and keto diets trigger distinct immune system changes in just two weeks
皮特获得 780 万美元拨款，用于改善阿片类药物使用障碍患者的护理质量匹兹堡大学药学院的项目评估和研究单位 (PERU) 已获得国家药物滥用研究所提供的为期五年、价值 780 万美元的拨款，用于提高宾夕法尼亚州阿片类药物使用障碍患者的护理质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Pitt-secures-2478-million-grant-to-improve-quality-of-care-for-病人-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Pitt-secures-2478-million-grant-to-improve-quality-of-care-for-病人-with-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20e83567-3286-4b25-8065-c874ef127290 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:07:13 -0500 Pitt secures $7.8 million grant to improve quality of care for patients with opioid use disorder
肠道微生物组可能是对抗常见呼吸道病毒的关键佐治亚州立大学生物医学科学研究所转化抗病毒研究中心的研究人员表示，肠道中微生物群的组成会影响小鼠对呼吸道病毒感染的易感性以及这些感染的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Gut-microbiome-may-hold-key-to-fighting-common-respiratory-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Gut-microbiome-may-hold-key-to-fighting-common-respiratory-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e930e8fa-9cb9-4015-a84d-ea79fd92e4b5 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 18:02:28 -0500 Gut microbiome may hold key to fighting common respiratory viruses
